title: Realistic landscape grid
description: Natural scenes in a 4×4 grid with photorealistic style.
prompt:
Create an image in a perfectly aligned 4×4 grid, with thin, sharp black borders between each cell and a pastel background.

Uniform style for all 16 illustrations: realistic, clean and precise lines, monochrome colors, fine outlines. Anthropomorphism On: illustrated elements may have eyes, face, or character.

In each cell, place a single centered element, front view, clearly recognizable shape.

Below each illustration, write the name in French, simple black sans-serif font, uniform and readable size.

Perfectly square grid, strictly equal cell sizes, uniform spacing, high resolution, sharp details.

title: Icon set – minimalist
description: Clean icon grid for UI or app assets.
prompt: Create an image in a perfectly aligned 4×4 grid, with thin, sharp black borders between each cell and a pure white background. Uniform style for all 16 illustrations: minimalist vector, clean and precise lines, flat and vivid colors, bold black outlines. In each cell, place a single centered element from the category fruits, front view, clearly recognizable shape.

title: Realistic variety grid
description: Mixed realistic subjects in grid layout.
prompt: Generate a 4×4 grid of realistic images. Each cell is a high-quality photograph-style image: varied subjects (objects, nature, architecture). Consistent aspect ratio, sharp borders between cells, professional color palette.

title: Schema / diagram style
description: Structured visual schema in grid form.
prompt: Create a 4×4 grid with thin black borders. Each cell contains a simple, diagrammatic illustration: clean lines, no shading, flat colors. Style: schematic, educational. Uniform icon-like elements, white background.

title: Icons – soft palette
description: Soft pastel icon grid for gentle UI.
prompt: Create an image in a 4×4 grid with thin black borders and white background. All 16 cells: soft and pastel colors, minimalist vector style, no gradients. Single centered element per cell from a chosen theme, front view, clean outlines.
